Package com.umidity.api.caller

Class ApiCaller

java.lang.Object
com.umidity.api.caller.Caller
com.umidity.api.caller.ApiCaller
public class ApiCaller
extends Caller
This class handles every connection to the OpenWeather API.
Important! Currently. the EMode property is generally ignored as Ummidity only uses Jackson to parse JSON responses. Moreover, in future versions EMode may be totally deprecated.

      @Deprecated public ApiCaller​(java.lang.String appid, EMode emode, EUnits eunits)

      Api caller constructor

      appid - Api key
      emode - response mode
      eunits - response units

      Make a oneCall call to api.
      Parameters:
      lat - latitude
      lon - longitude
      excludes - objects to exclude from response (see openweather documentation for more info)
